extends java.lang.Object

Method Detail

addItem

public void addItem(java.lang.String barcode,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    double cost,
                    int stock)
Adds new item to the ITEMS table. The function that calls this should check if the member that requests to modify the database has permission

Parameters:
barcode - the item's barcode
name - the item's name
cost - the item's cost
stock - the item's stock

addMember

public void addMember(int pmKeys,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      boolean isAdmin)
Adds new member to the MEMBERS table. The function that calls this should check if the member that requests to modify the database has permission

Parameters:
pmKeys - the new member's pmKeys
name - the new member's name
admin - if the new member is an admin

addTransaction

public boolean addTransaction(int pmkeys,
                              java.lang.String barcode)
Adds a new transaction to the TRANSACTIONS database

Parameters:
pmkeys - the pmkeys of the member making the transaction
barcode - the barcode of the item the member
Returns:
a boolean indicating if the transaction was successful

findTransactions

public java.lang.String findTransactions(int pmkeys)
Finds every database entry in the TRANSACTIONS table that matches the member's given pmkeys and exports it to a String.

Parameters:
pmkeys - the pmkeys of the member
Returns:
a String representing the entries

firstSetup

public void firstSetup()
Creates the tables that the TOC requires. They will all be initially empty. There is a restriction in the name of members and items to 25 characters. Initialises an admin account which will usually be the TOC representative of a division. Note to Devs: Remember to modify this function to allow us to change the initial admin details when a user first install it

public double getItemCost(java.lang.String barcode)
Gets the cost of the item that matches the barcode

Parameters:
barcode - the barcode of the item
Returns:
the cost of the item

the member's name (Default: "Member Not Found"

removeItem

public void removeItem(java.lang.String barcode)

removeMember

public void removeMember(int pmKeys)
Removes member from the MEMBERS table. As an additional note, this will not remove the member's details from the TRANSACTIONS table so their past bills will still be available. NOTE TO GORDO: Would you like it to be like this or would you like to remove the bills as well?

Parameters:
pmKeys - the member's pmKeys

updateAdmin

public void updateAdmin(int pmKeys)
Changes the member status of a member to either admin or not admin

Parameters:
pmKeys - the members pmKeys to be updated

updateCost

public void updateCost(double cost,
                       int barcode)
Updates the cost of an item in the database

Parameters:
cost - the updated cost of the item
barcode - the barcode of the updated item
